title: BeWater - I Build Therefore I Am

cryptoArt.t8: There is no limit to themes, recommended themes include "self-cultivation of leeks", "walking in the bear market", based on DeBox's four NFT penguins, eagles, snakes, and bunnies related to the life of cute animals, DeBox and film and television works related jokes, such as DeBox God of Gamblers, Stud, etc.
cryptoArt.t10: Themes are not limited, you can refer to "PFP Reconstruction of DeBox Four NFTs", "Next Blue Chip PFP", "Image of Social PFP", etc. Extra points will be awarded for handcrafted PFPs.
cryptoArt.t12: For an introduction to fractal art, please refer to here https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fractal
cryptoArt.t13: It must be generated with the help of programs, and we encourage artists to collaborate with programmers to create stunning works of art through program generation.
cryptoArt.t15: Show off your love for classic pixel art, and handmade pixel art pieces created without the use of AI will receive extra points.
cryptoArt.t16: The canvas size is limited to 16x16, 32x32, 64x64, and 128x128.
cryptoArt.t19: HeartX will assist the winning artists in 1/1 Digital Art track to be verified at HeartX platform and minting their winning artworks on the zkSync, the layer2 of Ethereum.Other top three artworks from each track will be minted as ERC-721 (NFT) tokens. They will be eligible for future community-organized auctions, with all proceeds going directly to the designers.
cryptoArt.t21: Each of the top three projects in each track will receive 500vDBX provided by DeBox and 5,000$HNX provided by HeartX. Additionally, the fourth to tenth place winners in the 1/1 Digital Art track will receive a reward of 3,000$HNX. There are also sponsorships from several other partners, including USDT, NFT whitelist, and corresponding platform tokens. Stay tuned for more details.
cryptoArt.t23: This event will collaborate with multiple partners to promote the participating artworks, offering exposure to an audience of hundreds of thousands.In addition, the top three artists in the 1/1 Digital Art track will have their personal pages featured on the HeartX platform's homepage banner for 24 hours.
cryptoArt.t26: Express your passion for digital art by creating captivating artworks with cryptographic elements. No limitations on form or medium. But they must be one-of-a-kind and have not been minted on any blockchain.
cryptoArt.t27: Image size within 2MB to 20MB (JPG, PNG, GIF), video size up to 100MB (MP4).

campaign.t2: Team information and project submission will be submitted on
campaign.t12: Interested in a campaign? Form your dream team and join us
campaign.t13: Join BeWater now to contribute to innovation with your own strength
campaign.t14: Sign up now for China's first Starknet Workshop and contribute to innovation and change
campaign.t15: Nearly 25,000 pre-registered developers and designers have already claimed their BeWater Early Bird badges
campaign.t16: Workshops have limited seats on a first-come-first-served basis
campaign.t25: and contribute to innovation and change
